categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Drop Point: Gelgelar was an Alliance to Restore the Republic drop point run by Colonel Arik Stijhl during the Galactic Civil War. It was built within a warehouse leased from Slerog Fenn at the Gelgelar Free Port. During the Galactic Civil War, the base was destroyed by the Doom Slayer assassin droid after it was inadvertently brought to the drop point by Major T'Charek Haathi and her Special Ops team aboard a YT-1300 light freighter called The Maker.
